list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove Jackson library configuration file
Deleted the configuration file for the Jackson library, likely as part of a cleanup or dependency management update. This change ensures the project no longer references or includes unnecessary library files.

task.summary:
Add initial implementation of binary tree and test suite
Introduced a generic binary tree implementation (`BinaryTree`) with support for node addition and tree traversal (preorder, inorder, postorder). Added a comprehensive test suite and interactive menu for testing various tree functionalities.

Improve tree rendering and refactor formatting logic
Enhanced the BinaryTree's `toString()` method for better visual representation, including dynamic width calculation and clearer structure rendering. Adjusted ANSI formatting in Main.java for consistent alignment. Also fixed a test case issue and streamlined null-check logic for cleaner code.

Add utility methods and documentation to BinaryTree
This commit introduces multiple utility methods to the `BinaryTree` class, including node search, height calculation, leaf counting, and more. It also adds proper Javadoc-style documentation for better code clarity and maintainability. Additionally, minor improvements, such as removing unused imports and refining methods, were made for overall code optimization.

Remove Jackson library configuration file
Deleted the configuration file for the Jackson library, likely as part of a cleanup or dependency management update. This change ensures the project no longer references or includes unnecessary library files.

MESSAGE.value:
Add initial implementation of binary tree and test suite
Introduced a generic binary tree implementation (`BinaryTree`) with support for node addition and tree traversal (preorder, inorder, postorder). Added a comprehensive test suite and interactive menu for testing various tree functionalities.

Improve tree rendering and refactor formatting logic
Enhanced the BinaryTree's `toString()` method for better visual representation, including dynamic width calculation and clearer structure rendering. Adjusted ANSI formatting in Main.java for consistent alignment. Also fixed a test case issue and streamlined null-check logic for cleaner code.

Add utility methods to BinaryTree for traversal and analysis
Introduced methods to calculate height, node count, sum of node values, and leaf count. Added search functionalities for nodes and their levels, improving binary tree operations and traversal capabilities.

Add utility methods for traversal, search, and analysis in BinaryTree
Introduced various methods to enhance BinaryTree functionality, including searching, height calculation, node counting, leaf counting, node sum calculation, and level determination. Improved documentation with detailed comments for better code understanding. Simplified `addInOrder` method signature and removed an unused import.

Add utility methods and documentation to BinaryTree
This commit introduces multiple utility methods to the `BinaryTree` class, including node search, height calculation, leaf counting, and more. It also adds proper Javadoc-style documentation for better code clarity and maintainability. Additionally, minor improvements, such as removing unused imports and refining methods, were made for overall code optimization.

Remove Jackson library configuration file
Deleted the configuration file for the Jackson library, likely as part of a cleanup or dependency management update. This change ensures the project no longer references or includes unnecessary library files.
